judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Bolger. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Oscar M. Hansen, with him Morgan, Lewis & BocMus, for appellants.
Richard W. Ledwith, with him Roger Scattergood and MacGoy, Evans & Lewis, for appellant.
H. Ober Hess, with him Boyd L. Spahr, Jr., William R. Spofford and Ballard, Spahr, Andrews & Ingersoll, for appellees.
Richard W. Thorington, with him Edmonds, Obermayer & Rebmann, for Philadelphia Bar Association, appellee.
